item.title: Exploration in Reinforcement Learning
item.description: The exploration-exploitation dilemma: do you try new things (might be better) or stick with what works (guaranteed decent)?

item.title: Q-Learning - Learning Action Values
item.description: Learn the value of actions without knowing environment dynamics. Q-learning: simple, powerful, the foundation of DQN and modern deep RL.

item.title: PageRank - The Algorithm That Built Google
item.description: Not all links are equal. A link from Wikipedia matters more than a random blog.

item.title: Bloom Filter - Probably Yes, Definitely No
item.description: A set that uses almost no memory. Trade-off: might say “yes” when answer is “no” (false positive).
